title: Wrap with Love Blanket Square
description: A single 25cm x 25cm square. These building blocks are joined by volunteers to create warm wraps for those in need worldwide.
community: Visit the Wrap with Love warehouse in Alexandria to meet other volunteers.
donationInstructions: Squares should be exactly 25cm x 25cm. Drop at local collection points or post to Alexandria NSW.

title: Wrap with Love Full Blanket
description: A completed wrap consisting of 28 squares (4 wide by 7 long), sewn together securely to create a full blanket for those suffering from cold.
community: Join a local 'Wrap with Love' sewing circle in your area.
donationInstructions: Join securely using a mattress stitch or similar strong seam. Deliver to Alexandria warehouse.

title: Australian Red Cross Trauma Teddy
description: Trauma Teddies provide comfort to children and adults during times of crisis. Every teddy must be knitted to a specific pattern and checked by a Red Cross coordinator.
community: Join the Red Cross Knitting community through your local branch.
donationInstructions: Teddies must be checked for safety. Contact your local Red Cross branch for drop-off details.
